name: Ambari
tagline: Adimpression uses Ambari for managing its servers!
body:
# Making Hadoop management simpler by developing software for provisioning, managing, and monitoring Apache Hadoop clusters

## Why? 

### Because Ambari makes it a breeze to setup servers with HBase/HDFS/MapReduce/Zookeper (etc).
### Because Ambari is open sourced
### Because Ambari has a great user interface
### Because Ambari itself is very easy to setup
### Because Ambari is well documented
